content.text: All the words next to the lights in your preview screen are the names of each light. Type light.on(a1, color = yellow) to make light A1 turn on.
The light.on command can turn any light on, you just need to tell it the name. Turn on the third light with light.on(a3, color = red) .
Turn on the fifth light with light.on(a5, color = pink) .
Letâ€™s make the seventh light blue with light.on(a7, color = blue) .
Finally, the ninth light should be cyan. Type light.on(a9, color = cyan) .
See your rainbow come to life by pressing MAKE . Can you fill in the gaps with other lights?
